DOC.brief_summary: This trial prospective , randomize , feasibility trial primary aim compare well oral rapidly dissolve olanzapine control primary headache pain compare current treatment strategy use emergency department often require intravenous intramuscular medication .
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Question : Does oral rapidly dissolve olanzapine provide efficacious analgesia patient acute headache non-organic origin ( primary headache ) come ED abortive therapy compare current standard care ? Secondary Aim : Additionally , study aim see oral rapidly dissolve olanzapine decrease 1 ) duration ED length stay 2 ) need IV access compare current standard care . This prospective , randomize , convenience sample , feasibility trial test non-inferiority oral rapidly dissolve olanzapine versus current emergency department standard care provide symptomatic relief patient present primary headache .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult patient 1865 year age present emergency department acute primary headache 2 . Patient approve inclusion primary attend physician emergency department 1 . Age < 18 > 65 2 . Pregnancy 3 . Known allergy olanzapine 4 . Known QT prolongation underlie condition place patient risk QT prolongation 5 . Inability give write consent ( intoxication , alter mental status ) 6 . Headache organic origin ( trauma , infection , previous recent head neck surgery ) 7 . Patient already prescribe daily olanzapine outpatient basis 8 . Patient administer olanzapine within past 24 hour 9 . Language barrier
